gGUI Analysis Package¶

gGui Startup Script¶

gguicli_startup.create_image_canvas(imageDataToDisplay, glueApp)

Function to generate a new image widget. (Designed for consistency with above)

Parameters:
  • imageDataToDisplay (glue.core.data.Data) – Glue (Pandas) Data object containing image intensity array
  • glueApp (glue.app.qt.application.GlueApplication) – Current instantiation of the Glue Application to spawn canvas into
gguicli_startup.create_scatter_canvas(dataToDisplay, xatt, yatt, glueApp, xmin=None, xmax=None, windowTitle=None)

Function to generate new scatter widget. (Designed for modularity and organization)

Parameters:
  • dataToDisplay (glue.core.data.Data) – Glue (Pandas) Data object to display on scatter widget
  • xatt (str) – Index of Glue Data Object to display along x axis
  • yatt (str) – Index of Glue Data Object to display along y axis
  • xmin (numpy.float64) – Minimum value of X Axis
  • glueApp (glue.app.qt.application.GlueApplication) – Current instantiation of the Glue Application to spawn canvas into
gguicli_startup.lightcurveChopImport(glueApp, dataCollection, parentData, obsWindows)

Receives list of obs windows, breaks dataseries accordingly, imports data object to collection

Parameters:
  • glueApp (glue.app.qt.application.GlueApplication) – Current instantiation of the Glue Application to spawn canvas into
  • dataCollection (glue.core.data.DataCollection) – Library of imported data objects to current Glue interface
  • parentData (glue.core.data.Data) – Glue (Pandas) Data Object containing CSV lightcurve data
  • obsWindows (list) – List of observation windows with indices upon which to chop
gguicli_startup.lightcurveChopList(parentData, axis, timeInterval)

Breaks observation data into observations separated by timeInterval. Returns list of times

Parameters:
  • parentData (glue.core.data.Data) – Glue (Pandas) Data Object containing CSV lightcurve data
  • axis (string) – parameter to split across (usual = time)
  • timeInterval (numpy.float64) – interval/amount to split parameter ‘axis’ across
Returns:

list – List of autochop regions
gguicli_startup.prompt_user_for_file(dialogCaption, dialogNameFilter)
Modular QtWidget File-Selection Dialog to prompt user for file import.
Returns array of filenames selected
Parameters:
  • dialogCaption (str) – Caption to display along top of file dialog window
  • dialogNameFilter (str) – Filters file dialog to certain extension
Returns:

list – Python list of filenames selected by user
